mUCpz8UXUqORbJV2M.name: Focus-Limited (@Any ordinary variety of matter or energy@)

mR6g3evbYAswf2yUJ.name: Focus-Limited (@Any ordinary variety of matter or energy@)

teWC8-oSSn0lBX5ef.name: *Assistance with this Psionic Powers Library*
teWC8-oSSn0lBX5ef.notes: Helpful comments can be found in the modifiers of this advantage.

moYCrg_K35ZZUGfaF.name: 0 point psionic abilities
moYCrg_K35ZZUGfaF.notes: Many psionic abilities in the GURPS Psionic Powers book do not have a fixed cost per level.  To deal with this, I used modifiers as a replacement for ability levels.  You only need 1 level active at a time (i.e. you do not need Interruption_2 and Interruption_1 active, only Interruption_2).

m_zl-aQIK_xgJamNO.name: Skills requiring an _ (underscore) as a prereq.
m_zl-aQIK_xgJamNO.notes: The underscore is related to the irregular points per level of some psionic abilities.  If a skill is red and says this is the problem, go to the related ability and activate a modifier to "level up" your ability.  All levels 1+ fulfil this requirement.

mM0tdt89tUbKhDaEy.name: Custom Psionic Powers
mM0tdt89tUbKhDaEy.notes: Limited versions of psionic powers at reduced cost.  These are not compatible with the delimited version the power (i.e. Take either Telekinesis talent or Psychokinesis Talent, but not both.)

mCiB4sZb07cUF9Yik.name: Questions, Comments, Errors
mCiB4sZb07cUF9Yik.notes: This is an early edition and is quite possibly riddled with errors.  I'd welcome any assistance; Send any comments to jdshue@mtu.edu

tx0Ta2-5BN06RV0NM.name: Cancellation

mB-VgHWPJEhAa55lY.name: Cancellation_2

mL0MYISbOh9bzgTCx.name: Cancellation_4

mjwj9ujfO9VBbP-lq.name: Cancellation_5
mjwj9ujfO9VBbP-lq.notes: Can cancel someone at a distance; apply long-distance modifiers p. B241

ttmDfQQbx1KO4-GXa.name: Interruption
ttmDfQQbx1KO4-GXa.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Interrupt a connection between a psi and his target.

mwQLa4-08gQ4Zb5OR.name: Interruption_3

mxvSFdAskizr4oQEu.name: Interruption_4
mxvSFdAskizr4oQEu.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

tFx7A-HBS9fMHnFK3.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Invisible to psionic detection.

tWkIdDnHrE-ZUDhyg.name: Psionic Overload
tWkIdDnHrE-ZUDhyg.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Overload a psi's abilities, causing them to manifest uncontrollably.

mRK4Xaa3Y3sVhP0H4.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

mD2oR79xD2wUYpA9p.name: Psionic Overload_4
mD2oR79xD2wUYpA9p.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

mSPM_1FvWv5N7FISX.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use range penalties p. B550

mVR8soWsUNYpog0t5.notes: You can interrupt a connection at a distance.  Use long-distance modifiers p. B241

tjvStHZTuKsFiZCyh.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Bonus to Will for resisting psionic mental intrusions.

t31ow7LN6w9vnm0Vg.name: Psychic Armor
t31ow7LN6w9vnm0Vg.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Reduces damage taken from psionic attacks.

tcifTgWWNu2TS81MN.name: Screaming
tcifTgWWNu2TS81MN.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Mentally scream to interfere with psi usage.

tEDsCu_y_vpXEl2bt.name: True Sight (Anti-Psi)
tEDsCu_y_vpXEl2bt.notes: Anti-Psi ability. Can see through psionic illusions.

ttD40HcDN5dQ3HN4_.name: Astral Armor
ttD40HcDN5dQ3HN4_.notes: Astral projection ability.  DR equal to astral armor level while astral projecting.

t4TtFi7PnYwyucxwh.name: Astral Celerity
t4TtFi7PnYwyucxwh.notes: Astral projection ability. Increases move while astral projecting.

ti25tFl24IWUhrmtU.name: Astral Sight
ti25tFl24IWUhrmtU.notes: Astral projection ability. Can see entities on the astral plane while in the real world.

mjRNsZLXQ8IszhYYL.name: Astral Sight_1
mjRNsZLXQ8IszhYYL.notes: You are completely blind to the secondary plane.

mLi_1spHkCuYgIqBI.name: Astral Sight_2
mLi_1spHkCuYgIqBI.notes: Semi-awareness of events on the secondary plane (-4 to vision rolls).

mSd_u6F5rsOf35kj4.name: Astral Sight_3
mSd_u6F5rsOf35kj4.notes: Observe both planes simultaneously without penalty.

mp91nQEMnYcrRY_F3.name: Hearing
mp91nQEMnYcrRY_F3.notes: Can hear whispers from the observed plane.

tps_NcltrdaFwR62e.name: Astral Sword

t-iQTWlCyP-rmot_a.name: Astral Travel
t-iQTWlCyP-rmot_a.notes: Astral projection ability. You can send your mind to the outer astral plane.

m8YMdbFvvfBjBVriA.name: Astral Travel_1

mJ12bcoSwPE9FoAAO.name: Astral Travel_2
mJ12bcoSwPE9FoAAO.notes: 1 minute actual time = 30 minutes on astral plane.

mXynC6aerRq75LAZO.name: Astral Travel_3

msYKh4ENYbPJRQFBK.name: Astral Travel_4

mT876VDMfeP0T5o58.name: Astral Travel_5

mfs9Xx9RcMOYmfokm.name: Astral Travel_6
mfs9Xx9RcMOYmfokm.notes: 1 second actual time = infinite time on astral plane.

t2NOz5cNsoopPG6cQ.name: Flash

tP7aztHjkxwr76JKS.name: Hologram
tP7aztHjkxwr76JKS.notes: Photokinesis ability.  Create realistic images out of light; Use p. Psi22 psionic range table.

tcoPnRmjsFEOwV5Vo.name: Awareness

t1MZFvbxzoN2j-aoy.name: Clairaudience
